name: Spectrum (itch) (Skully B)
description:
Spectrum is a small platformer developed for the 2017 Rainbow Game Jam.

Move left and right and jump about to try to get to the gate at the end of each section. There are also coins dotted about for collecting.

While in the game, escape will return to the main screen. In the main screen, escape will quit the game.

Epilepsy warning: This game contains flashing imagery
